description:
This is a scalar market on what the price of @balajis (on bitclout) will be on July 18, 12:00 PM ET. The lower bound for this market is $10,000.00, and the upper bound is $30,000.00. The resolution source for this market will be price of @balajis on bitclout (https://bitclout.com/u/balajis?public_key=BC1YLhWLHNaJ39vFtByYQuPXop2dBT219zzzZB5i1jYqvEXaXrs8dqL&stepNum=1), currently listed under “@balajis”. The resolution source will be checked at 12:00 PM ET on July 18. If the website is down or the price isn’t listed, the website will be checked again at 3:00 PM ET, and finally at 6:00 PM ET. If the website is still down or the price still isn’t listed, the website will be checked the following day at 12:00 PM ET, 3:00 PM ET, and 6:00 PM ET, and so on up to July 25 until the price is listed. If at 12:00 PM ET July 25, 2021, the website is still down or the price still isn’t listed, the market will resolve to $20,000, which is in between the upper and lower bounds of the market. 

You can use the calculator to the right (underneath the Buy modal) to calculate how each Long or Short Token price corresponds with @balajis coin price. Long and Short shares will settle proportionally to the outcome value if the final value is between these bounds, but if the final value exceeds either the upper or lower bound, the price of each Outcome Token is capped at $1 and $0. In the event of ambiguity in terms of the market outcome, the market will be resolved in good faith at the sole discretion of the Markets Integrity Committee (MIC).
